item.title: Outside Fonehouse, 25th November
item.description:
The pavement outside Fonehouse 359 kilburn high road is damaged. It’s behind Bus Stop C. It poses a health & safety risk to local residents and pedestrians walking

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has parked during the middle of the night and causing a nuisance, 25th November
item.description:
This car was parked during the night (24/11/2025) and is currently blocking the public pathway leading to the allotments, as well blocking the pavement so people have to walk in the road and obstructing a driveway. Due to the street being narrow this car is causing blockage and isn't taxed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ripley Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
